data: techandbusiness.org Pierce Berke and Leo Duarte techandbusiness.org is a podcast/newsletter founded by Leo Duarte & Pierce Berke. We aim to initiate a thought-provoking and engaging conversation about the latest developments in tech and business, featuring two young experts in the field.
